message: If you find yourself negatively impacted by the stress of being a legal professional, this is a can't-miss presentation!

Lynn Garson, attorney, mental health advocate, and author, will lead our next free presentation, Balancing the Scales, Practical Stress Management for Lawyers, on Wednesday, September 2023 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT.
bottomline: Claim Your Seat for This Popular Program Now!
message3: Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of Competence Issues MCLE credit in California. If you want CLE credit, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

message: Are you struggling with stress in your practice? Have you noticed a colleague struggling to manage the stress of being a lawyer? Join us for a CLE-accredited webinar offering tools for managing high stress and resources for getting the assistance necessary to put a stressed lawyer back on the path to success.Â

Lynn Garson, attorney, mental health advocate, and author, will lead our next free presentation, Balancing the Scales: Practical Stress Management for Lawyers, on Wednesday, September 20 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT.

message: Have you ever felt the weight of stress from the demanding legal profession? We understand the unique challenges you faced by practicing attorneys and are offering a presentation today on managing stress in a busy law practice.
In today’s presentation, Justia Connect members can learn to identify stress triggers, recognize the hallmarks of stress in themselves and others, practical skills for stress management, and more!
Lynn Garson, attorney, mental health advocate, and author, will lead this free presentation, Balancing the Scales: Practical Stress Management for Lawyers, today at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT.
